What's New in Shift Beta 1.1.0

üîí Advanced Security & Privacy

Privacy & Security Hub: A new dedicated section to manage your app security.
Screenshot Security: Request permission to disable screenshots in a chat. If approved, the chat is protected from screenshots and screen recording for both parties.
Biometric Vault: Secure your Encrypted Vault with your fingerprint or face unlock for faster access.
Two-Way Deletion: When you block a user, the conversation and messages are now permanently deleted for both you and the blocked user.

üìÅ Vault Improvements

"Move" to Vault: Adding a photo now automatically deletes it from your phone's gallery, ensuring it's truly private.
Export from Vault: You can now export photos back to your gallery if needed.
Biometric Auto-Unlock: The vault now prompts for biometrics automatically when opened.

üí¨ Chat & Friends

Friend Removal: Blocking a user now automatically removes them from your friends list.
Disappearing Messages: Set accurate timers (5s, 10s, 1m, 5m) for messages to auto-delete.
Graceful Handling: Improved stability if a chat is deleted while you're viewing it (no more crashes!).
Scrollable Updates: The "What's New" popup is now scrollable so you can read all the details.

‚ú® Enhancements

Mute Notifications: Silence specific conversations.
Clear Chat: Quickly wipe message history without removing the friend.
Performance: Various bug fixes and UI improvements.
